Text: Thailand's Got Talent season 6 (also known as TGT) was the sixth season of the Thailand's Got Talent reality television series on the Channel 3 television network, and part of the global British "Got Talent" series.

Text: Thailand's Got Talent (season 6):  It is a talent show that features singers, dancers, sketch artists, comedians and other performers of all ages competing for the advertised top prize of 10,000,000 Baht (approximately $325,000).

<Text: Thailand's Got Talent (season 6):  Thailand is also the fifth country in Asia to license Got Talent series.>

Text: Thailand's Got Talent (season 6):  The four judges Chalatit Tantiwut,Patcharasri Benjamad,Kathaleeya McIntosh and Nitipong Hornak join hosts Ketsepsawat Palagawongse na Ayutthaya.
